Text.Page:
The desert harts around here are beautiful—particularly their horns.

Unfortunately, those Tenebrara's evil tricks seem to have spread to those handsome creatures as well.

I can't get rid of them because Felion might find me if I leave my bush.

Since you're going to have to kill them anyway—you know, because they're evil—you may as well bring me their horns, too.

Excellent! I have been waiting years to get my hands on these horns!

Uh, I mean...tragic. Tragic that such handsome beasts had to be slain.

Here, just take your cut and get out, yeah?

Look, I know it's tragic to kill such beautiful animals, but it's really very important that I get those horns.

Because of that horrible spell. The spell has affected all the animals, you know.
